resources.string: No network connection found! Please check your network connection.
Response time out error! Please check your internet connection and try again.
Server authentication failed! Please try again.
Server isn\'t responding! Please try again.
Network not found! Please check your internet connection and try again.
Unable to parse Data! Please try again.
Network connection is weak!\nData has been saved in offline mode.\nPlease use "OFFLINE DATA SYNC" button at the "ACTION PAGE" to upload the data when network connection is available.
Your present credentials do not match with your last login credentials!\nPlease enter proper credentials.
Are you sure you want to download all the school data?\nThis may take several minutes depending on your network strength.
